ygData.subject: Lvl 31 Equipment Help
ygData.msgSnippet: I need some suggestions on what equipment I should get.  I can spend any amount of money.  This is what I have now Earrings: +2 agi Neck: Black Pearl Choker
ygData.messageBody:
I need some suggestions on what equipment I should get. I can
spend any amount of money. This is what I have now

Earrings: +2 agi
Neck: Black Pearl Choker
Face: Sheer Bone Mask
Head: EXE Hood
Rings: Jagged Bands
Wrist 1: Silver-plated Bracer
Wrist 2: Erolissi Bracer
Arms: Drake-Hide
Gloves: Wu's Fighting Guntlets
Shoulder: Tattered Mantle
Chest: Foreman's Tunic
Belt: Purple Sash of Order
Legs: Feathered Leggings
Feet: Kobold Hide Boots

Also, whats a good place to lvl group or solo at lvl 31? Thanks in
advance for the help.

Thomm Spiritjumper
31 monk of mith marr
